```{r}
#| output: false
library(rdeck)
library(dplyr)

sf::sf_use_s2(FALSE)

works <- readr::read_rds(here::here("data", "works.rda"))
baltimore_city <- readr::read_rds(here::here("data", "baltimore_city.rda"))
```


```{r}
rdeck(
  map_style = mapbox_gallery_moonlight(),
  theme = "light",
  initial_bounds = sf::st_bbox(baltimore_city)
) |>
  add_scatterplot_layer(
    data = works,
    get_position = geometry,
    get_fill_color = "#008385",
    name = "Works",
    radius_min_pixels = 3,
    opacity = 0.6,
    tooltip = c(title, year, primary_artist),
    pickable = TRUE
  )
```
